summary.Title: Warehouse workers for containers emptying in Horsens
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse workers for containers emptying in Horsens
summary.Presentation:
Warehouse workers for container emptying in Horsens and the surrounding area
We are looking for temporary workers for container emptying in Horsens and the surrounding area
If you can

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse workers for containers emptying in Horsens
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Warehouse workers for container emptying in Horsens and the surrounding area

We are looking for temporary workers for container emptying in Horsens and the surrounding area

If you can work 1 to 5 days a week, it is precisely you we need. If you want to supplement for your studies or if you want to work full time, then apply for this job.

You are treated well at the company, and there are breaks to get your coffee etc. which is paid for by the company.

t is mostly on dayshifts, but it will also be possible to have one to two shifts a week in the afternoon.
A good hourly wage is offered, which is around DKK 153,50 / hour.

We offer

  • A job in a good work environment
  • Opportunity for permanent employment
  • A part of a good and big team

We expect

  • You are meeting stable
  • You can work in daytime or afternoon
  • You can present a criminal record
  • You can speak and understand English or Danish

If this sounds like something for you, you are welcome to send us an application on our website www.bechpersonale.dk or on e-mail horsens@bechpersonale.dk. If you have any questions please call - 72 10 85 46. We look forward to hearing form you.
